title: Caramelised Onion and Ale Soup with Beef Strips
ingredients: ['30g butter', '2 tbsp olive oil', '500g onions, thinly sliced', '2 tsp caster sugar', '300g fillet steak, cut into 2cm thick slices', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '250ml brown ale', '1 bay leaf', '700ml beef stock, made with stock cubes', '2 tbsp chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']
